text: Additions to Esther refers to several additional chapters (11-16) to the Book of Esther, found in the Septuagint. These Chapters are found in Catholic and Orthodox Bibles but generally not in ones used by Protestants. Some of the additions are: * Mordechai's dream, his later interpretation of the dream in light of what happened to him in real life * Details of the decree against the Jews Category:Septuagint Category:Old Testament
title: Additions to Esther
